The normal distribution is the most important distribution in probability because of the

which states that if you add a large number of random variables, the distribution of sum will be  approximately normal under some conditions.  This results from the fact that many real life random variable can be express as sum of large number of random variables, and we can use CLT to say the distribution of the random variable should be normal.

The gamma function is the extension of the factorial function to the real (and complex) numbers.
